ISSUE.TITLE: "Buy Button" should be re-enabled after canceling the order contains stock managed product
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: - Assume **Stock quantity** is set to **10** for a product, and **Minimum stock availablity** is **0**, and also **Low stock activity** is set to **Disable buy button**. - A user buys all the **10**. - **Reserved quantity** automatically will be set to **10**. - And then **Add to Cart** button becomes disabled. - Admin cancels the order. - Reserved quantity returns to **0**. - But the product's **Add to Cart** button is still unavailble. (event after cleaning the cache or restarting the application)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #1355 Buy Button should be re-enabled after cancelling orders
